content:
In the US Breast Cancer IG, we're seeing a number of these types of errors in the QA:

Unable to provide support for code system http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode

The odd thing is that the structure def it refers to does not contain a reference to http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode anywhere within it. I don't know where the code system reference is coming from (not to mention that it's odd that the terminology server says it can't support the ActCode system).

Example Source: https://github.com/HL7/us-breastcancer/blob/db3fe96b9b66cd856bcea8cdb50d120845d9ac65/resources/structuredefinition-shr-oncology-BreastCancerPresenceStatement-model.json#L31-L37

breast-cancer-presence-keywords.png

Example QA Error: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/us-breastcancer/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-L1C73T_repo_resources_structuredefinition-shr-oncology-BreastCancerPresenceStatement-model

breast-cancer-presence-error.png
